#### Declarations diff

No declarations were harmed in the making of this PR! üêô
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

This one is weird, since the variable must already be around.
Yes, this one was incorrect! Thanks for catching it.
It was suggested by the linter due to a bug in 4814 that has since been fixed, so hopefully it won't happen again.
This one is weird, and already in the other PR.
